pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
Unless the concern is the use of `SystemPaths`... I guess it's kind of hard to know where to draw the line between UNIT and INTEGRATION.

Edit: After some though, the test assumes that `SystemPaths` will simply work as expected and does not place any expectations or assertions on it, so I think it's fair to use it as a utility for a `PluginLoader` unit test.

That said, good testing practices are not my domain of expertise, so my view on this could be totally wrong.
content.html:
Unless the concern is the use of SystemPaths... I guess it's kind of hard to know where to draw the line between UNIT and INTEGRATION.

Edit: After some though, the test assumes that SystemPaths will simply work as expected and does not place any expectations or assertions on it, so I think it's fair to use it as a utility for a PluginLoader unit test.

That said, good testing practices are not my domain of expertise, so my view on this could be totally wrong.
